attributes.action: Are the issues promoted by " right wing" groups, needing attention from the government?
attributes.additional_details: We the public, want the government to deal with the issues that are being brought up by these "right wing" groups, such as immigration, foreign crime, foreign aid, treason toward our forces, security ricks of covered faces, a two tier justice system, a two tier government. That is just the tip of them, the public want answers.
